function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Insufficient social distancing measures leading to increased disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the distance respiratory droplets can travel","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in confined spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of control over probability of infection pi in relation to social distance and ventilation rate","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of virus via respiratory droplets through close contact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures leading to virus transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the adequacy of social distancing recommendations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of public transportation without proper health protocols","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate transportation arrangements by the company","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate testing methods for covid-19 may result in the failure to identify asymptomatic or incubating individuals.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of daily health screening and assessment may lead to undetected covid-19 cases in the offshore workplace.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on lower sensitivity testing methods may result in missed covid-19 cases, allowing infected individuals to enter the workplace.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to covid-19 during travel to the workplace via public transportation modes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of periodic medical check-ups mcus to assess and monitor worker health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on a hierarchy of controls for covid-19 prevention with challenges in elimination","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ppe for workers based on their specific risks, leading to insufficient protection from covid-19 exposure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited facilities for self-quarantine and self-isolation, leading to challenges in preventing covid-19 transmission among workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in ensuring workers’ compliance with health protocols during self-quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of handwashing facilities with soap and alcohol-based hand rub","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in offshore facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of administrative controls to minimize exposure to sars-cov-2","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of monitoring of confirmed, probable, suspected cases, and close contacts of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to eliminate or substitute covid-19 from the offshore workplace","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to establish physical barriers and directions to control worker traffic in narrow areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Handling confirmed covid-19 cases in the workplace","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Workers with comorbidities are at a higher risk of covid-19 infection and severe complications.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to conduct a self-health evaluation and implement preventive measures for workers in shared vehicles increases the risk of covid-19 transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of efficient contact tracing measures for workers in shared vehicles can lead to difficulties in identifying close contacts in case of a confirmed covid-19 case.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of pre-employment and periodic medical check-ups for offshore workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete compliance with medical check-up requirements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient adherence to covid-19 prevention guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in the workplace due to close contact and contact with contaminated surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High person on board pob density in offshore platforms leading to increased risk of covid-19 outbreak","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on productivity and industries due to worker illness and absenteeism","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Coronavirus transmission through contaminated surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sustaining time of coronavirus on different metal surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Similar behavior of sars-cov-2 and sars-cov-1 on metal surfaces and in aerosols","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of disinfectants containing phenolic agents","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High concentration of inorganic compounds for disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of virus sustainability on surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Comparative study of virus behavior on different surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High viral load and asymptomatic carriers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Efficacy of disinfectants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of infective organisms on metal surfaces and in aerosols","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced infectivity of covid-19 virus in aerosols over time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of various chemical substances in sanitisers and disinfectants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Coronavirus sustainability on various surfaces, leading to potential transmission through touch.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hidden transmission of the virus by carriers who are unaware of their infection status.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness and limitations of disinfectants in eliminating microorganisms on various surfaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Origin of sars-cov from bats and transmission through intermediate sources like palm civets","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
